d <- import(here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds")) %>%
  theme_minimal(d)
```

```{r commit2, fig.height = 10, fig.width = 10}
supd <- d %>% 
  count(screen_name) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:25)

supd <- supd %>% 
  mutate(screen_name = fct_reorder(screen_name, n))

p1 <- supd %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = screen_name, y = n)) +
  geom_col(fill = "cornflowerblue") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 12) +
  ggtitle( "Most prolific #rstats tweeters",
    subtitle = "Top 25 screen names displayed") +
  ylab("Count") +
  xlab("Twitter Screen Name")
p1
```
